Name: Lupa
About the game: From an aspiring indie game developer comes Lupa. A beautiful stylized polygon 3rd-person exploration game. With a semi-open world and the story inspired by Roman mythology. Lupa is a She-Wolf and she is the mother of two little cubs. As the winter is about over she wakes up in her cave and can't seem to find her entire pack! She goes looking for them. This is where you as a player come in. You accompany Lupa in this beautiful world full of Vegetation and Life. Help Lupa find her missing pack and her two little cubs. And uncover secrets along the way... Key features: For people who like Journey, The First Tree, Spirit of the North, and Lost Ember. A relaxing story-based game with a semi-open world. Colorful biomes, forests, snow, and roaming wildlife. Short game (About an hour) depends on how much you explore the world There is sadly no controller support.
